name: Fantasy Gate
description:
A long time ago, 3 teenagers were summoned to a magical world in order to defeat a greater evil. With teamwork, powerful spells they learnt along the way and strategy, they did. However, Mayg decided that she didn't want to return to her original world and clashed with her friends to stay in there. 

Manipulated by the ramins of the "Grater Evil", in an act of despair, she destroyed Fantasy Gate, their portal to home, trapping the 3 there. After a long while struggiling to fight against Mayg, Hiro and Wander managed to find one of the Fantasy Gate pages and felt hope that they could get home again. However, Hiro ended up disapearing and Wander started to lose hope.... Until he comes up with the idea of using the pages that the two had already collected to bring help! Like this, Theo, Iris and Dellie must help Wander and Hiro colect the fantasy pages in order to defeat Mayg and the ramains of the Greater Evil so they can all return home together.

-This is a combat mechanics Demo wich takes place in the final battle of this game

-I got really inspired by Undertale and Deltarune during my whole life, so it shouldnt be a surpirse that this game is inspired on them

-Assests like music, sounds, visual effects are currently placeholders

-If this gets popular enough i may continue the development, dunno tho ¯\_(ツ)_/¯   

(Btw: A spoiler free demo is avalible as well!)

-The placeholder music for Terry is this one:

-The background and some visual effects are from RPGmaker

-The projectiles, character art and coding was done by me

-Feel free to leave any feedback about the game
